# Some Code With Tests Failing

This chapter contains tests that fail, oh no!

```{r, code_chunk3}
correct_answer <- FALSE
correct_answer
```

```{r, test_chunk3, opts.label = "test"}
test_that("code_chunk3 runs correctly", {
  expect_equal(correct_answer, TRUE)
})
  
```


```{r, code_chunk4}
correct_answer <- TRUE
correct_answer
```

```{r, test_chunk4, opts.label = "test"}
test_that("code_chunk4 runs correctly", {
  expect_equal(correct_answer, TRUE)
})
  
```

```{r, code_chunk5}
another_one <- FALSE
another_one
```

```{r, test_chunk5, opts.label = "test"}
library(testthat)
test_that("code_chunk5 runs correctly", {
  expect_equal(another_one, TRUE)
})
  
```
